column1: Puchheim is a town near Munich in the district of FÃ¼rstenfeldbruck

Puchheim is divided into two parts: the old and rural part called Puchheim-Ort and the new part of Puchheim (Puchheim-Bahnhof) that was founded when the S-Bahn (a quick train commuting to Munich) was built. Before that there was one of the first civil airfields in Bavaria
column2: which was later used as a prisoner of war camp during World War I.  The area around the camp was dried up by workers from the POW camp
column3: so that houses could be built.

column1: The old part of Puchheim is even older than Munich.Puchheim is well connected to the regional and national traffic network by S-Bahn  (S4) and Autobahn (A 8
